00108         public function __construct() {
00109         
00110         parent::__construct(self::LEAF_REG_KEY);
00111             
00112                 $this->requestUri   = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
00113 
00114         /*
00115          * Αντικατάσταση των πιθανών συνεχόμενων /, με ένα μόνο.
00116          */
00117         $this->requestUri = preg_replace("@/+@i", "/", $this->requestUri);
00118         
00119                 /*
00120                  * We check if there are any illegal characters in
00121                  * the Uri that they shouldn`t.
00122                  * Moreover, we take into consideration if the option
00123                  * $this->config['url_suffix'] is used which defines the file
00124                  * extensions that will be shown, so we ignore it.
00125          *
00126          *
00127                  */
00128                 /*$skipExt = (!empty($this->config['url_suffix']))
00129                                         ? "(\.[^?=&]+)?"
00130                                         : "";*/
00131         $skipExt = "";
00132                         
00133                 $skipQueryString = ($this->config['allow_query_strings']=="Yes")
00134                         ? "(\?(["
00135                                 . $this->config['allow_query_string_chars']
00136                                 . "]+(=["
00137                                 . $this->config['allow_query_string_chars']
00138                                 . "]*)?\&?)+)?"
00139                         : "";
00140                         
00141                 $checkUri = preg_match_all(
00142                         "|"
00143                                 . "^[" . preg_quote($this->config['allow_uri_chars']) . "]+"
00144                                 . "{$skipExt}{$skipQueryString}$" .
00145                         "|iu",
00146                         $this->requestUri,
00147                         $hits
00148                 );
00149                 
00150                 if ($checkUri==0) {
00151                     /*$this->logger->log(
00152                         "Error",
00153                         "Routing Error, Malicious characters found in Uri ("
00154                         . "{$this->requestUri})"
00155                     );*/
00156                     
00157                         showHtmlMessage(
00158                             "Routing Error",
00159                             "Malicious characters found in Uri!",
00160                             true
00161                         );
00162                 }
00163                 
00164                 /*
00165                  * We check if there is a query string in our uri.
00166                  * If query strings are enable in file
00167                  * (Etc/config.php - parameter $config['allow_query_strings']),
00168                  * we process it in an associative array way.
00169                  * Either way, we remove the query string from the
00170                  * request uri.
00171          *
00172          *
00173                  */
00174                 if (preg_match("@\?(.+(=.+)?\&?$)+@iu", $this->requestUri, $matches)) {
00175             
00176                         if ($this->config['allow_query_strings']=="Yes") {
00177                 
00178                                 $this->queryString = $matches[0];
00179 
00180                                 $keysWithValues = explode("&", $matches[1]);
00181 
00182                                 foreach ($keysWithValues as $Elem) {
00183 
00184                     if (strpos($Elem, "=")) {
00185                                 list($Key, $Value) = explode("=", $Elem);                
00186                                 $this->queryStringElements[$Key] = $Value;
00187                     } else {
00188                         $this->queryStringElements[$Elem] = NULL;
00189                     }
00190                                 }
00191                 
00192                                 $this->requestUri = preg_replace(
00193                                         "|"
00194                                                 . preg_quote($this->queryString) .
00195                                         "|iu",
00196                                         "",
00197                                         $this->requestUri
00198                                 );
00199                 
00200                         } else {
00201                                 $this->requestUri = preg_replace(
00202                                         "|" . preg_quote($matches[0]) . "|i",
00203                                         "",
00204                                         $this->requestUri
00205                                 );
00206                         }
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 
00210                 /*
00211                  * Removal of leading base dir.
00212          *
00213          *
00214                  */
00215                 $this->requestUri = preg_replace(
00216                         "@^{$this->config['base_dir']}@",
00217                         "",
00218                         $this->requestUri
00219                 );
00220                 
00221                 /*
00222                  * Removal of the url trailing if defined.
00223          *
00224          *
00225                  */
00226                 if (!empty($this->config['url_suffix']))
00227                         $this->requestUri = preg_replace(
00228                                 "@\.{$this->config['url_suffix']}/?$@",
00229                                 "",
00230                                 $this->requestUri
00231                         );
00232                 
00233                 /*
00234                  * Removal of trailing '/' (if exists in Uri).
00235          *
00236          *
00237                  */
00238                 if (preg_match("@/$@", $this->requestUri))
00239                         $this->requestUri = preg_replace("@/$@", "", $this->requestUri);
00240 
00241                 /*
00242                  * If no class is defined instatiate the default Controller.
00243          *
00244          *
00245                  */
00246                 if ($this->requestUri=="/"      ||
00247                         $this->requestUri==NULL ||
00248                         ($this->requestUri{0}=="?" && $this->config['allow_query_strings']=="Yes"))
00249                         $this->requestClass = $this->config['default_controller'];
00250                         
00251                 /*
00252                  * We extract the Controller class (if defined).
00253          *
00254          *
00255                  */
00256                 else
00257                         $this->chopSegment($this->requestClass);
00258                 
00259                 /*
00260                  * We extract the method (if defined).
00261          *
00262          *
00263                  */
00264                 $this->chopSegment($this->requestMethod);
00265                 if ($this->requestMethod==NULL)
00266                     $this->requestMethod = "index";
00267                 
00268                 /*
00269                  * If there are more segments in the Uri, except from the
00270                  * class name and the method name, we store those segments
00271                  * in an array and we provide them at the user`s disposal.
00272          *
00273          *
00274          *
00275                  */
00276                 $segments = explode("/", $this->requestUri);
00277                 foreach ($segments as $s) {
00278                         if ($s!=null)
00279                                 $this->segments[] = $s;
00280                 }
00281                 
00282         }

00329         private function chopSegment(&$seg)
00330         {
00331                 if ($this->requestUri!="") {
00332                         if (preg_match("@([^/\?]*)@", $this->requestUri, $hits)) {
00333                                 $seg = $hits[0];
00334                                 $this->requestUri = preg_replace("@([^/\?]*/?)@", "", $this->requestUri, 1);
00335                         }
00336                 }
00337         }
